title: CAB का समर्थन करने के लिए कैसे रातों-रात कई ट्विटर हैंडल के धर्म बदल गए
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: I’m a Muslim. I support #CABBill. I strongly denounce the protests launched by my muslim brothers across the nation. They either didn’t understand the bill and have been manipulated or they’re knowingly targeting the govt as a political move. But I’m very proud of it. Jai Hind🇮🇳
